attributes.action: give the right to key workers (such as nurses, teachers and social workers) to apply for 'Indefinate Leave to Remain' after 5 years, even if some of the time was spent on a Working Holiday Maker Visa.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many public service institutions such as schools and hospitals are heavily reliant on Australian, New Zealander and South African staff. However, many of these workers are not able to apply for 'Indefinate Leave to Remain' after 5 years. This is because workers are often spending the first few years on a Working Holiday Maker Visa. We would like to ask that any time working in a shortage occupation be recognised towards the 5 years, regardless of whether any time was spent on a Working Holiday Maker Visa.
